amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to reduce funding for educational and cultural exchange programs to FY2019 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for educational and cultural exchange programs to FY2019 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 246 (Roll no. 297).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 246 (Roll no. 297).
